title: What is the significance of Frederic William Henry Myers and his coining of the term "telepathy" in relation to the Society for Psychical Research and the study of classical Greek and Roman literature?
first_phrase: This text focuses on the concept of higher states of consciousness, starting with the founding of the Society for Psychical Research by Frederic William Henry Myers, who coined the term "telepathy." The text describes the work of Eduard von Hartmann, a German philosopher, and his pessimistic views. The text then goes on to explore the symbolism behind the rebis, the athanor, the rose, the compass, and the kundalini, among others. It also discusses the importance of intuition and the power it holds in guiding an individual toward their true purpose. The last 200 tokens of the text discuss Christian Rosenkreutz's journey and the symbolism of the sun on a coin he received.
content: Infatti la forma del compasso che è puntato verso l’alto ricorda la rinascita (e risalita) dopo le fasi precedenti e che appunto corrisponde all’albedo: l’uomo dopo essersi purificato rinasce dall’uomo (cfr. Ambelain, Scala Philosophorum cit. ; Arturo Reghini, Le Parole Sacre e di Passo dei primi tre gradi e il massimo mistero massonico, Atanòr, Todi 1922). 90 Reghini, Dizionario Filologico cit., p. 97. 91 «L’intuition est cette voix du cœur, de la conscience, qui, lorsqu’on le lui permet – en vivant selon les lois vraies de pureté, d’harmonie, de se faire entendre et de guider – indique à l’- homme, dont elle représente la plus pure manifestation, l’émanation, ce qui est conséquent avec ses buts véritables, et qui doit lui permettre de s’orienter sans erreur ni retards aux fins de juste accomplissement et de réalisation de son individualité. Originalité, paix, confiance en soi, loyauté et évolution constamment accélérée par l’emploi des appuis et occurrences convenables sont le lot de l’individu que guide son intuition» (Dr. Hanish, Diagnostic Personnel, Éditions Mazdéennes, Paris 1934). 92 Infatti per il massimo successo in questa fase vi invitiamo anche a eseguire nel libro II i consigli riguardo alla memorizzazione di immagini. 93 Nelle Nozze Chimiche di Christian Rosenkreutz di Johann Valentin Andreae (a cura di E. Aicher, SE edizioni, Udine 2006) il protagonista riceve nella seconda giornata una moneta con sopra il simbolo del sole.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the practice of alchemy is a journey of self-discovery that requires the purification of the self and the integration of all energies. Through the development of intuition and the use of techniques derived from quantum physics, yoga, and ancient manuscripts, one can achieve a higher state of consciousness and ultimately, the realization of the true self. It is important to understand the logic behind this philosophy and to focus on the present moment, as it is only through the expression of ourselves in the present that we can achieve complete reintegration.
